title: This service is only available to users of a certain age

tosdr.case: This service is only available to users of a certain age
tosdr.tldr: The Terms of Service state, "This Site and the Services are available only to Users who can form legally binding contracts under applicable law. By using this Site or the Services, you represent and warrant that you are (i) at least eighteen (18) years of age, (ii) otherwise recognized as being able to form legally binding contracts under applicable law, and (iii) are not a person barred from purchasing or receiving the Services found under the laws of applicable jurisdiction."
